title: Application Assistance
description: Guidance and support through the application process to ensure successful ATL establishment.

title: Lab Setup and Equipment
description: Custom-designed kits such as robotics, 3D printers, electronics, and more to foster practical learning.

title: Curriculum Support
description: Age-appropriate curriculum enhances learning and encourages creativity in students.

title: Faculty Training
description: Training for teachers to effectively guide students in using ATL resources.

title: End-to-End Assistance
description: From ATL grants to lab setup, curriculum integration, and support.
